Objective
To have a dynamic, challenging and rewarding career in Mechanical Engineering and to reach

Khapoli, regarding Operation, Maintenance and trouble shooting of DG’s.

Strength

Present Responsibilities:
Operation, Maintenance and trouble shooting of Engines.
Operation and Maintenance of Auxiliaries. Such as, Compressor, DM plant, Black start
